verses.name: Numbers 2:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 2:2
verses.text: Every man of the children of Israel shall pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their father’s house: far off about the tabernacle of the congregation shall they pitch.

verses.name: Numbers 2:3
verses.text: And on the east side toward the rising of the sun shall they of the standard of the camp of Judah pitch throughout their armies: and Nahshon the son of Amminadab shall be captain of the children of Judah.

verses.name: Numbers 2:4
verses.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred.
